title: Funerary Figurine of King Pinudjem I
description:
Small bright blue faience Ushabti of Penezem I. One column of painted inscription down front of body, painted flail grasped in each hand. 
Condition: Glaze chipped on lower left side of body, otherwise excellent.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour
